Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Frank R. Smith to receive accidental performance of duty disability retirement benefits
Summary: Authorizes Frank Smith, a New York city police detective, to receive accidental performance of duty disability retirement benefits for illness suffered as a result of exposure to disease during undercover assignments as a member of the police department of the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Frank R. Smith to receive performance of duty disability retirement benefits
